person.persName: Chatham T. Ewing (Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, attorney, soldier, and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, attorney, soldier, and commissioner of deeds. New Lisbon, Ohio, native. Married to Ella Wheeler Ewing. Law Student in Pittsburgh in 1860. Attorney in Pittsburgh in 1862. Captain of Ewing's Battery of Light Artillery in Pittsburgh from 1862 to 1864. Resumed law practice in Pittsburgh in 1865. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Pennsylvania in 1865.
